x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: This fix script updates the "rm_sprint.story_points" column as below: - changes its label from "Story points", "Total committed points" or "Total commited points" (the latter is a typo) to "Current scope points"
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Update "rm_sprint.story_points" column

sys_update_version.name: x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_01c6ff8c83e89e50c6695855eeaad3de
sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts"><x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description>This fix script updates the "rm_sprint.story_points" column as below: - changes its label from "Story points", "Total committed points" or "Total commited points" (the latter is a typo) to "Current scope points"</description><name>Update "rm_sprint.story_points" column</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[function updateStoryPointsColumnLabel() ]]></script><sys_class_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-05 15:08:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>01c6ff8c83e89e50c6695855eeaad3de</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update "rm_sprint.story_points" column</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Now Utils" source="x_938076_now_utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Now Utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_01c6ff8c83e89e50c6695855eeaad3de</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-05 15:08:22</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts></record_update>
